terrains.name: Sunshine Farm
terrains.description: Fertile land with good drainage and water access.
terrains.usageClauses: Only for organic vegetable cultivation. No use of chemical pesticides.

terrains.name: Hope Estate
terrains.description: Large land with well-fertilized soil and irrigation system.
terrains.usageClauses: Allowed for cultivation of all types of crops. Must respect crop rotation.

terrains.name: Flower Ranch
terrains.description: Land with warm climate ideal for tropical fruit cultivation.
terrains.usageClauses: Exclusive use for tropical fruit cultivation. No heavy machinery allowed.

terrains.name: Green Fields
terrains.description: Flat land with excellent soil composition and nearby water source.
terrains.usageClauses: Suitable for a variety of crops. No restrictions on pesticide use.

terrains.name: Mountain View Farm
terrains.description: Sloped terrain with rich soil and natural irrigation.
terrains.usageClauses: Recommended for vineyards and orchards. No chemical fertilizers allowed.

terrains.name: Riverfront Estate
terrains.description: Land bordering a river, perfect for rice paddies and aquaculture.
terrains.usageClauses: Reserved for rice cultivation and fish farming. No hunting or fishing allowed.
